txt_en: Few words, many deeds.
txt_cn: 少说话，多做事。

txt_en: My philosophy is if you worry, you suffer twice.
txt_cn: 我的人生信条是：遇事发愁，火上浇油。

txt_en: Great men are not born great, they grow great.
txt_cn: 伟大的人不是生来伟大，而是在成长的过程中渐渐变得伟大。

txt_en: Youth is not a time of life; it is a state of mind.
txt_cn: 青春不是年华，而是心境。

txt_en: I love summer because it is full of life and hope.
txt_cn: 我爱夏天，因其充满生机与希望。

txt_en: No water, no life.
txt_cn: 水是生命之源。

txt_en: The hard thing to do and the right thing to do are usually the same thing.
txt_cn: 难做的事和该做的事往往是同一件事。

txt_en: Saving the world requires sacrifice.
txt_cn: 拯救世界需要付出代价。

txt_en: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
txt_cn: 逃避命运之人，终将直面命运。

txt_en: Let's seize the day and live it to the fullest.
txt_cn: 只争朝夕，不负韶华。

txt_en: May you be loyal to yourself, live like yourself.
txt_cn: 愿你忠于自我，活出自我。

txt_en: Disaster is more painful for survivors because it's hard to forget.
txt_cn: 灾难对于幸存者来说更痛苦，因为它难以忘却。

txt_en: Don't let anyone ever make you feel like you don't deserve what you want.
txt_cn: 别让任何人让你觉得自己不配拥有梦想。

txt_en: To Mothers: Happy Mother's Day! Love yourself to gain more happiness!
txt_cn: 致母亲：母亲节快乐！爱自己，更快乐！

txt_en: When you start to live the life you have been wanting, all the scars of the past will become medals.
txt_cn: 当你过上了想要的生活，过往的一切伤疤都会成为勋章。

txt_en: Great things never came from comfort zones.
txt_cn: 伟大的事物从不来自于舒适圈。

txt_en: Do not let your emotions override your judgment.
txt_cn: 不要被情绪影响了你的判断力。

txt_en: No road of flowers leads to glory.
txt_cn: 没有一条通往光荣的道路是铺满鲜花的。

txt_en: It's okay to be scared. In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared.
txt_cn: 害怕是正常的，感到害怕才能学会勇敢。

txt_en: Those who follow the light will eventually be radiant.
txt_cn: 追光者终将光芒万丈。

txt_en: Loving you is the most grand and joyful secret in my youth.
txt_cn: 爱你是我青春里最盛大且欢愉的秘密。

txt_en: It is much more difficult to judge oneself than to judge others.
txt_cn: 审判自己比审判别人要难得多。

txt_en: There's no rhyme or reason to this life.
txt_cn: 世事无常。

txt_en: The day is short but the work is much.
txt_cn: 工作多，光阴迫。

txt_en: People are afraid of what they don't understand.
txt_cn: 人们害怕他们不理解的东西。
